alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Quay County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 4:27AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL ROOSEVELT, SOUTHEASTERN QUAY AND CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 515 AM MDT... At 427 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Bellview to 9 miles west of Grady. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Portales, Texico, Melrose, Floyd, Grady, Saint Vrain, Ranchvale, Arch and Oasis State Park. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 363 and 397. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Quay County; Roosevelt County
